record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1932. Third row: N. H. Norgren (assistant coach), L. E. Apitz (assistant coach), John Womer, Harlan O. Page, Jr., George Mahoney, William Berg, Simon Benson, Captain Hilton, Barton Smith, Edward Cullen, Dr. C. O. Molander, and H. O. Page (line coach); second row: Frank Thomson, Robert Shapiro, Hugh North Mendenhall, Peter Zimmer, Wayne Rapp, Walter Maneikis, LeRoy Walters, John Baker, Thomas Flinn, William Cassels, and Ellmore C. Patterson; first row: John Spearing, Warren Bellstrom, Bernard Johnson, Allan Summers, Donald Birney (captain), A. A. Stagg (coach), Vinson Sahlin, Keith Parsons, George Schnur, Pompeo Toigo, and Raymond Zenner.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on board. Caption on copies.
